ygData.subject: Re: Leveling
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, Paladins have very useful stun spells. In fact, with the addition of Luclin, we now have three of them of varying strengths and durations. Cease,
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, Paladins have very useful stun spells. In
fact, with the addition of Luclin, we now have three of
them of varying strengths and durations.<br><br>Cease,
level 9, last about 1.5 seconds<br>Desist, level 15,
lasts about 2.5 seconds<br>Stun, level 30, lasts around
4 seconds<br><br>These are great spells for
pulling. You can get a mob's attention from a distance and
give yourself a head start in running back to your
party. Particularly good, too, if you are soloing and
don't have SoW.
